body_html:
just wanted to chime in to say i've gotten comfortable with the numpy-likeness of pytorch, so this really tripped me up today. if there was a push to make pytorch even more numpy-like, that would be really helpful 👍in the meantime i've been replacing my swapaxes calls with a wrapper:

def swapaxes(x,a,b):
    try:
        return x.swapaxes(a,b)
    except AttributeError:
        return x.transpose(a,b) # support pytorch
